attributes.action: Extend "Child Trust Fund" To All Children Under 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears the "Child Trust Fund" was introduced in 2002 to encourage "Tax Free" savings for all children born after its introduction & to provide each child with a "Tax Free" lump sum for the benefit of the child when he/ she reaches 18 years of age. In addition to the standard Govt. Contributions, the "Child Trust Fund" appears to allow a further £100 per month to be saved "Tax Free" for the childs benefit (e.g. Parents etc.).

It appears that a child born BEFORE the "Child Trust Fund" was introduced in 2002 is NOT entitled to such a "Tax Free" Trust.

I would like to propose that the "Child Trust Fund" be extended to include all children under the age of 18, allowing £100 per month to be saved "Tax Free", by any party (e.g. parents), for the benefit of each child until they reach 18.

I am also proposing that the "Child Trust Fund" may then be converted to an "ISA" when the child reaches 18.
